recipesJson.name: Please Sir, Can I Have Sâ€™More?
recipesJson.author: SweetPoisonKim
recipesJson.description:
Toasted Marshmallow squished onto a Graham Cracker and drizzled with Chocolate. 

Was watching Wayneâ€™s Letâ€™s Mix video the other day and realised Iâ€™d never made a Sâ€™mores vape. Didnâ€™t have FW GC so I left that out and tweaked his recipe slightly to get as close as possible to my ideal sâ€™more. 
If you want his exact recipe youâ€™ll have to watch the vid as I donâ€™t think itâ€™s on ATF. 
Anyways, I kept the FA Cookie, TFA GCC and AP the same as his, banking on it giving me enough Graham without using FW, which it does... just! 
For the Marshmallow I opted for FW instead of FAs because itâ€™s a more authentic artificial/gooey marshmallow flavour in my opinion. I love FAs but it wasnâ€™t the type of Marshmallow I wanted to taste in this recipe. 
I had to add some TFA Toasted Marshmallow to â€˜toastâ€™ the Marshmallow, gives a little diversity to it as well as the obvious toasted notes that I think helps the Cracker out a bit too. 
Totally agree with the FW VBIC. Gives a bit more weight to the Marshmallow and very subtle vanilla, without smacking you in the face with it like TFAs. 
Dropped the FA Meringue half a percent, so itâ€™s an almost imperceptible sugary little accent.
I used the old INW Choc, but JFs would be fine in the same percentage. Itâ€™s not enough to scream Chocolate, but itâ€™s there sitting nicely at the back end of the vape doing as itâ€™s told. 
Super Sweet to enhance the perception of chocolate. Adjust to preference. 
And thatâ€™s that! 
Itâ€™s still not what I would consider â€˜perfectâ€™, the only thing I think itâ€™s lacking is the Graham Cracker. Itâ€™s there, underneath the â€˜Mallows but it could do with a boost. The Marshmallow and Chocolate are spot on in my opinion though.  Benefits from at least an overnight steep, more if you donâ€™t enjoy fresher flavours.
Big thanks to Wayne for the base recipe to tweak from, legend as always! ğŸ‘
